name: Who Stole my Oranges?
description:
A very short puzzle game where you help a slime get his orange back from the mean bird!

Made for 8 Bits to Infinity's Mouse Jam 2! This was a lot of fun to just play around with and making the game mouse only was a unique take for a jam.

I haven't been working with Godot for very long but this was a great learning experience for overall how to use Godot, and developing a process that works for me.

All art, music, and code was done by me!
